mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (user_seq_id, content, created_at, board_id) VALUES(#{userSeqId},#{content},now(),#{boardId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.user_id AS userId FROM comments AS c JOIN users u on c.user_seq_id = u.seq_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId}
